tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE carbon_emissions (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_name TEXT,
   emission_type TEXT,
   emission_amount DECIMAL,
   offsetting_activity TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE offsetting_activities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_type VARCHAR,
  activity_description TEXT,
  date_completed DATE,
  emission_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (emission_id) REFERENCES carbon_emissions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE carbon_offsetting (
   offset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_id INT,
   offset_date DATE,
   offset_tons FLOAT,
   offset_price DECIMAL(10,2),
   FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES carbon_emissions(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CarbonEmissions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  emission_type VARCHAR(255),
  emission_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  emission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE OffsetActivities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(255),
  offset_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  offset_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CompanyInfo (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  founding_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Reporting (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  report_type VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(255)
);
